title: How to Make Savoury Floral Butter

steps.headline: Pluck the flowers from the herbs if you haven't already done so.
Place the herb flowers and the butter into the mixing bowl.
Whisk together until combined.
steps.description: If this is too difficult, use a food processor but be aware that the flowers will be all chopped up instead of left whole and pretty. The butter is now ready for spreading unless you wish to mould it, in which case proceed to the next step.

steps.headline: Place the butter in the mould.
steps.description: Return to the refrigerator to set.

steps.headline: Serve or use in pre-made food as needed.

text: Pluck the flowers from the herbs if you haven't already done so.  Place the herb flowers and the butter into the mixing bowl.  Whisk together until combined. If this is too difficult, use a food processor but be aware that the flowers will be all chopped up instead of left whole and pretty. The butter is now ready for spreading unless you wish to mould it, in which case proceed to the next step. Place the butter in the mould. Return to the refrigerator to set. Serve or use in pre-made food as needed. Spread on sandwiches before adding fillings.
